name: NeptuneGL (itch)
description:
NeptuneGL is a fast-paced three dimensional six degree of freedom space shooter game in which the player possesses a space ship and must fly in all dimensions to attack other ships. Heavily themed with a sci-fi aspect, the game includes lasers, missiles, and realistic movement physics. Depending on the choice of the level at start, the game can be set in an enclosed mine-like zone, or an open space. There are several key features that constitute the gameplay. 

You will use lasers and bolts combined with missiles of different types to defeat your enemies in the game. The player has shield and energy indicators that are clearly visible to improve reaction time during a fight, as well as a radar system to always show where enemy ships are via red blips. The camera can additionally be Instantly interchangeable camera views for first and third person.

If you are up for the challenge and enjoy sci-fi space games, this one's for you!

This is a game that I made for fun, and I hope you enjoy the game. If you have feedback for the community behind the game, please join my discord or send me a message on twitter or youtube!

If you have any comments please be constructive and I will be happy to look into any issues and fix them as they are mentioned, since I'm at my desk all day and develop this stuff for a living.
